TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WaterfallDialog extends Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.Dialog

Docs.summary: Dialog optimized for prompting a user with a series of questions. Waterfalls accept a stack of functions which will be executed in sequence. Each waterfall step can ask a question of the user and the user's response will be passed as an argument to the next waterfall step.
